markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Compsognathus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2914)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The compsognathus is a small bipedal dinosaur that moves in swift, darting motions. Its bite injects a venom that causes numbness and weakness, a trait the animal uses to bring down larger prey, although it prefers to scavenge or snatch insects and other smaller creatures for its meals.

 The compsognathus is curious to a fault, often getting itself into trouble. It measures 3 feet long from head to tail and weighs 15 pounds—small enough to serve as a house pet or familiar for a spellcaster. In cases where magical links aren't involved, however, those keeping the creature would be well-advised to treat it with the same caution one might extend to a pet viper or other poisonous reptile, as they're partly tame at best.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Compsognathus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2914)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=576" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 96 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus compsognathus venom

**Compsognathus Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d8 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

</column>

name: Compsognathus
